channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 07:55 Auxiliary alarm in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Solve for further reports.
item.description: 游릭 07:55 Auxiliary alarm in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Solve for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 07:55 Axiety in the Kharkiv region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 游리 07:55 Axiety in the Kharkiv region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community#Kharkiv_ This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 07:55 A.c.55 Flag into Dnipropetrovsk region.Plocate, anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Pokrovskaya Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 07:55 A.c.55 Flag into Dnipropetrovsk region.Plocate, anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Pokrovskaya Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk.
